title: Solana Developer Bootcamp 2024 - Learn Blockchain and Full Stack Web3 Development - Projects 1-9
description:
This bootcamp is a full introduction to blockchain, smart contracts, and full stack web3 development on Solana. Going through every lesson should bring you zero to hero on blockchain development and get you building production applications on Solana.

This video contains projects 1-9.

# Bootcamp
Part 1, Projects 1-9: https://youtu.be/amAq-WHAFs8
Part 2, Projects 10-13: https://youtu.be/HOdYZSe1uhE

# Table of Contents

(0:00:00) | Welcome to the Bootcamp
(0:03:06) | Blockchain Basics
(0:10:22) | Project 1 | Building a Favorites Program
(0:37:42) | Project 2 | Creating a Voting Application
(1:50:32) | Project 3 | Integrating Blinks and Actions
(2:31:45) | Project 4 | Building a CRUD Application
(3:34:51) | Project 5 | Creating a Token
(3:49:12) | Project 6 | Creating a NFT
(4:25:22) | Project 7 | Building a Swap Program
(5:48:15) | Project 8 | Creating a Token Vesting App
(8:31:17) | Project 9 | Building a Token Lottery

# Resources

Everything you need will be found in the Bootcamp Repository: https://github.com/solana-developers/developer-bootcamp-2024
Documentation: https://solana.com/docs
Got a question on this bootcamp? Ask on the Solana StackExchange: https://solana.stackexchange.com/

# Presenters
Jacob Creech - https://x.com/jacobvcreech
Brianna Migliaccio - https://x.com/b_migliaccio
Mike MacCana - https://x.com/mikemaccana

title: Solana Founder: How Solana Mobile is Building the Future of Crypto | E119
description:
In this captivating conversation, Anatoly Yakovenko, co-founder of @SolanaFndn , shares the journey behind building one of crypto's most resilient blockchain networks.

From Soviet immigrant to Silicon Valley engineer to blockchain founder, Anatoly reveals how his wife convinced him to quit his stable job with just six months to build Solana. 

He discusses surviving the COVID market crash, the FTX collapse, and how Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin's support helped during their darkest days.

In this episode, we explore:

• Building the future of crypto mobile with Solana's innovative Seeker phone
• The evolution of Solana from blockchain to hardware manufacturer
• How their \

XRP、Solana、Cardano成美國戰略儲備！背後佈局超詳解，美國囤這三種幣不是巧合！

美國政府正式囤積加密貨幣！但這一次，故事的主角不只是比特幣和以太幣，而是——XRP、Solana、Cardano！

這三種幣，為什麼能被納入國家級戰略儲備？這是一個巨大的市場機會，還是全球金融秩序正在改寫的信號？

2025年3月，川普拋出震撼彈——「美國將建立世界上第一個國家級加密貨幣儲備，包含比特幣、以太幣、XRP、Solana和Cardano！美國將重返數位資產領導地位！」

這三種幣，過去曾經飽受爭議，甚至面臨監管打壓……如今，卻成為美國政府的囤積目標？

這不只是一次政策宣佈，這可能是一場全球金融權力的重新洗牌。

美國政府的真正意圖是什麼？華爾街嗅到了什麼，而你還沒發現？

🔔 貼心提醒
訂閱後不要忘記按旁邊的鈴鐺 
才不會錯過最新上傳的節目唷
